title: Native Forward Scholars Fund Professional Development Assistance Program 2025-2026
short_description: Empowering Students Through Experiential Learning: Native Forward Scholars Fund is dedicated to empowering students by providing financial support to access meaningful professional development opportunities specifically in non-STEM fields.
full_description: Empowering Students Through Experiential Learning: Native Forward Scholars Fund is dedicated to empowering students by providing financial support to access meaningful professional development opportunities specifically in non-STEM fields. These opportunities allow students to gain hands-on experience in areas critical to strengthening Tribal communities and fostering leadership development.
eligibility: Be an enrolled member or descendant of a US federally or state-recognized Tribe; provide proof of Tribal eligibility; be attending an accredited post-secondary institution; find their own non-STEM professional development opportunity.
